title: Episode 25: All Sumner 16
itunes:author: Desus Nice & THE KID MERO
itunes:summary:
Desus Nice (@desusnice) and THE KID MERO (@thekidmero) are the Bodega Boys giving you their irreverent yet hilarious takes on all things pop culture. Recorded (sometimes) at Red Bull Studios in NYC.

This week: Gorilla mom, Stopping gun violence, Day Parties, Hennypalooza, Protecting your spouce and much more!

Special thanks to @Free_Clams and @DonScottMusic for the studio time. and special shout to @DJDNA89 with the intro
